overview: Tim joined SurveyMonkey in September 2009. Previously he was at Google, where he spent six years in a variety of senior management roles in Online Sales & Operations. Most recently, he led the Inside Sales and Sales Strategy & Operations teams for AdWords North America. Prior to that he was Director of Operations for Google Checkout. Tim also built and led the international business operations for AdSense Online. Before Google, Tim worked as an investor at Silver Lake Partners, a leading technology private equity firm, and at Goldman Sachs in investment banking. Tim received a BSE in Civil Engineering from Princeton University.

relationships.title: Senior Vice President, Business Operations and Finance
